repo.title: Advanced configuration
repo.details: By default all labels are allowed to be tagged, if you want to customize more, insert your repository:
repo.label: owner/repo
repo.error: An error happened, report to our issue

types.title: Select when labels will be added

details.GITHUB_TOKEN: The repository will provide access to write in labels automatic
details.GITHUB_USER_TOKEN: You will need to generate an user token more info here and add it as a secret in your repository more info here

lables.title: Repository lables
lables.details: You can check and uncheck the disired label, and add synonyms to labels

modal.title: Adding synonyms
modal.text: Insert texts that when found on a issue will trigger the label
